shorts.title: SWB RAILRIDERS: Sweep doubleheader from Nashville
shorts.title_distilled: SWB RAILRIDERS: Sweep doubleheader from Nashville.
shorts.description: New look. Same results for the Scranton/Wilkes-Barre RailRiders. Erick Leal pitched a gem in the opener and the offense erupted early in the nightcap to help the RailRiders sweep a doubleheader from the Nashville Sounds, 2-0 and 8-3, on Friday night at PNC Field. It was the third straight win for the RailRiders (62-40) and improved them to 24-6 in the International League second half. They remain in first place, one-half game ahead of the Syracuse Mets, who also won their third straight Friday night, 5-3, at Buffalo. The RailRiders roster was affected by the moves the New York Yankees […]
shorts.content: New look. Same results for the Scranton/Wilkes-Barre RailRiders. Erick Leal pitched a gem in the opener and the offense erupted early in the nightcap to help the RailRiders sweep a doubleheader from the Nashville Sounds, 2-0 and 8-3, on Friday night at PNC Field. It was the third straight win for the RailRiders (62-40) and improved them to 24-6 in the International League second half. They remain in first place, one-half game ahead of the Syracuse Mets, who also won their third straight Friday night, 5-3, at Buffalo. The RailRiders roster was affected by the moves the New York Yankees […]

shorts.title: 20 years of jazz history brings music to Scranton
shorts.title_distilled: 20 years of jazz history brings music to Scranton.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU)— The Scranton Jazz Festival kicked off Friday. Organizers say what started as a one day festival with a few hundred people has evolved into a three day celebration with thousands making their way downtown. 28/22's Avery Nape has been in the Electric City all night. Thousands of people are expected to [...]
